All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEditItem
Activity class for adding or editing items in the inventory.
AddImage
Activity for adding images to an item.
BarcodeScannerActivity
Activity class for scanning barcodes and retrieving product information.
CameraActivity
CameraActivity is responsible for handling camera operations using CameraX library.
CustomDatePicker
A custom date picker class for selecting dates within the application.
CustomDatePicker.DatePickListener
Interface for the date picker listener.
DataLoadCallbackItem
An interface defining a callback for when Item data is loaded.
DataLoadCallBackTag
An interface defining a callback for when Tag data is loaded.
DetailsActivity
An activity class for displaying details of an item in the application.
EditProfileActivity
An activity class for editing user profile details like username, email, and password.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FilterCriteria
Represents the criteria used for filtering items, implementing Serializable for easy data passing.
ImageCarouselAdapter
Adapter for a RecyclerView that displays a carousel of images.
ImageCarouselAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class for the RecyclerView items.
Item
Represents an item with various properties, used in the application for tracking and managing items.
ItemAdapter
An adapter class for RecyclerView to display Item objects.
ItemAdapter.ItemAdapterListener
Interface for listener to handle adapter related events.
ItemAdapter.SelectionModeCallback
 
ItemAdapter.SumCallBack
 
ItemAdapter.ViewHolder
 
ItemBreakdown
Activity for displaying an item breakdown, including a pie chart and a list view of tags.
ItemBreakDownAdapter
Adapter for displaying item breakdown information in a ListView.
ItemDB
A database helper class for managing the 'items' collection in Firebase Firestore.
ItemDB.OnItemCollectionInitialized
 
ItemDBConnector
A connector class for Firebase Firestore, providing a configured instance of FirebaseFirestore.
ItemDBController
Controller for managing item database operations.
ItemDBController.OnAccountActionComplete
 
ItemDBController.OnInitializationCompleteListener
 
ItemDBController.TagCountsCallback
TagCounts Callback the returns a list of items for a set of selected tags
itemsViewAction
 
ListScreen
An activity class for displaying a list of items in the application.
ListScreenActivity
 
ListScreenActivityTest
 
MainActivity
The main entry point of the application.
SerialScannerActivity
This activity allows users to scan serial numbers by using OCR text recognition
SortActivity
An activity class dedicated to sorting functionalities within the application.
SortAdapter
Adapter for a RecyclerView that displays sorting options.
SortAdapter.SortViewHolder
ViewHolder for the SortAdapter.
SortComparator
This class is used to compare objects for sorting
Tag
Represents a tag that can be associated with an item.
TagAddEdit
Activity for adding or editing a tag.
TagDB
This class is used to connect to the Firestore database and perform CRUD operations on the "tags" collection.
TagDBController
This class is used to connect to the Firestore database and perform CRUD operations on the "tags" collection.
TestFilterCriteria
 
TestImageCarouselAdapter
 
TestItem
 
TestSortAdapter
 
TestSortComparator
 
TestTag
 
User
 
UserAuthTest
 
UserManager
This class is used to manage the currently logged in user.
